templates.name: Materiality Criteria Matrix
templates.description: Quantitative + qualitative thresholds for defining material controls. Includes financial impact thresholds, risk scoring criteria, and stakeholder significance assessment.

templates.name: Material Control Inventory (MCI)
templates.description: Structured list of 25-100 material controls with risk linkages, ownership, and preliminary documentation.
keyFeatures: Risk category and principal risk linkage

templates.name: Board Workshop Agenda
templates.description: 2-hour board session to secure mandate for P29 implementation. Includes FRC requirements overview, materiality criteria discussion, Q&A framework.

templates.name: Control Documentation Template
templates.description: Standardised format for documenting each material control. Sections: control objective, design, frequency, evidence, owner, testing approach.
keyFeatures: Detailed control design (what, how, when, by whom)

templates.name: RACI Matrix (Three Lines of Defence)
templates.description: Responsibility mapping for control execution, testing, assurance, and reporting across 1st, 2nd, and 3rd lines of defence.
keyFeatures: Activities: Control design, execution, self-assessment, independent testing, framework assurance, board reporting, remediation, escalation
Roles: 1st Line (Control Owner), 2nd Line (Risk/Compliance), 3rd Line (Internal Audit), CFO, CRO, Board

templates.name: Effectiveness Criteria Definition Guide
templates.description: How to define measurable effectiveness criteria for each control. Includes worked examples like '100% reconciliations within 5 days', 'Zero unauthorised access incidents'.
keyFeatures: Quantified threshold examples by control type

templates.name: Board Dashboard ('Approach on a Page')
templates.description: Quarterly board reporting template with RAG status. Sections: Material risks heatmap, control effectiveness summary, issues/remediations, assurance map.
keyFeatures: Material Risks Summary (heatmap with RAG and trends)
Top 5 Issues & Actions (owner, due date, status)

templates.name: Assurance Mapping Template
templates.description: Map assurance sources (1st, 2nd, 3rd line) to each material control. Identifies assurance gaps and documents coverage.
keyFeatures: 3rd Line Assurance (Internal Audit year, date, rating)

templates.name: Testing Protocol Library
templates.description: Sample testing procedures for common control types: access controls, reconciliations, policy compliance, segregation of duties.

templates.name: Dry Run Project Plan
templates.description: 6-8 week project plan for H2 2025 dress rehearsal. Includes testing schedule, evidence collection, board reporting simulation.

templates.name: Evidence Repository Structure
templates.description: How to organise control testing evidence for audit readiness. Folder structure, naming conventions, retention requirements.
keyFeatures: Folder structure by control ID and period

templates.name: Board Declaration Template
templates.description: Draft wording for annual report declaration of effectiveness. Includes variations: full effectiveness, effectiveness with exceptions, ineffectiveness with remediation.
keyFeatures: Paragraph 1: Monitoring and review process description
Paragraph 3: Ineffective controls and remediation (if applicable)

templates.name: Resource Planning Matrix
templates.description: Budget and headcount planning tool for 24-month implementation. Includes FTE by role, external consultant costs, GRC platform investment.
keyFeatures: FTE requirements by phase and role
Budget breakdown (internal FTE costs, external support, GRC platform)

templates.name: Stakeholder Communication Plan
templates.description: Who to inform, when, and how throughout implementation. Audiences: Board, Audit Committee, Steering Committee, Control Owners, All Staff.
keyFeatures: Channels (board meetings, town halls, email, intranet)

templates.name: Readiness Self-Assessment Checklist
templates.description: 30-question diagnostic to assess organisation's P29 readiness. Covers governance, risk management, control environment, assurance, and technology.
keyFeatures: 5 domains: Governance, Risk Framework, Control Environment, Assurance Capability, Technology
